item.title: Desert Rose add a quote by J. A. Konrath
item.description: "Sir, this lane is for ten items or less. I’m counting thirteen items in your cart, including that hemorrhoid cream. And while hemorrhoids might give you a reason to be nasty, they don’t give you a reason to be in this lane." -- J. A. Konrath

item.title: Desert Rose add a quote by Patricia Briggs
item.description: "I don't like it when I outweigh my men." -- Patricia Briggs

item.title: Desert Rose add a quote by Ilona Andrews
item.description:
"The phone rang. I picked it up.
“Are you sitting down?” Curran's voice asked. “Yes.” “Good.”
<i>Click.</i>
I listened to the disconnect signal. If he wanted me to sit, then I'd stand. I got up. The chair got up with me and I ended up bent over my desk, with the chair stuck to my butt. I grabbed the edge of the chair and tried to pull it off.
It remained stuck.
I would murder him. Slowly. And I'd enjoy every second of it." -- Ilona Andrews

item.title: Desert Rose add a quote by Jack Kilborn
item.description: "Like people would ever want to read books on an electronic screen." -- Jack Kilborn

item.title: Desert Rose add a quote by Jack Kilborn
item.description: "You know, you remind me of my younger brother. I miss that kid, so much that I sometimes regret killing him." -- Jack Kilborn

item.title: Desert Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "If you want to control someone, all you have to do is to make them feel afraid." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Desert Rose add a quote by Jacqueline Carey
item.description: "A nervous silence loosens tongues" -- Jacqueline Carey

item.title: Desert Rose add a quote by Leonard Ravenhill
item.description: "A man who is intimate with God is not intimidated by man." -- Leonard Ravenhill

item.title: Desert Rose add a quote by Rebecca McKinsey
item.description: "The ones who hate me the most are the ones who don't scare me." -- Rebecca McKinsey

item.title: Desert Rose add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Desert Rose add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Desert Rose add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Desert Rose add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "True love is rare, and it's the only thing that gives life real meaning." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Desert Rose add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "Look after my heart - I've left it with you." -- Stephenie Meyer
